aboutProject.title: About the Project
aboutProject.description: The Alumni Portal is a modern, comprehensive platform designed to bridge the gap between our institution and its distinguished alumni community. This project aims to create a vibrant ecosystem where former students can reconnect, share experiences, and contribute to the growth of current students.

aboutInstitution.title: M.N. Jha DAV Public School, Jhanjharpur
aboutInstitution.fullName: M.N. Jha DAV Public School, Behat, Jhanjharpur
aboutInstitution.description: M.N. Jha DAV Public School, located in Behat, Jhanjharpur (Madhubani), Bihar, is a premier co-educational CBSE-affiliated school. Established in 2003 and managed by DAV College Trust and Management Society, the school is known for blending modern education with traditional Vedic values.
aboutInstitution.history: Founded on July 1, 2003, the school was established to provide quality education in the region under the DAV College Managing Committee, New Delhi. It upholds the ideals of Maharishi Dayanand Saraswati and follows the principles of Arya Samaj. From modest beginnings, it has grown into one of the most respected schools in North Bihar.
aboutInstitution.vision: To develop responsible citizens with a strong sense of ethics, academic brilliance, and a global outlook through value-based education.
aboutInstitution.mission: To provide a nurturing and inclusive environment where students are encouraged to think critically, act with integrity, and grow into lifelong learners and responsible citizens.
